page.title: 04Our School
page.content: In l966 the Bishop of Bedford dedicated the new school building. It has two classrooms with a hall in between. There are folding doors between the classrooms and the hall. There are cloakrooms opening off the classrooms and washbasins in the classrooms. The classrooms and the hall open on to the playground. The playing field is joined on to the playground. We have a swimming pool with a fence all round it. There is a place to store things, a staff room and a kitchen for cooking our dinners. When I was eight we had some new things. We had a computer, a coloured television and a video recorder. We have a stereo record player, a piano and lots of books, pencils, felt tips and pens. We have central heating from a big boiler.
